title: How is a technical report different from a news report? What are their differences? - Quora

response.answer_text: Usually a technical report will include many facts & figures such as speed, weight, sizes,colour, volume, time, hardness, solubility, & is often accompanied by a drawing or diagram etc. whereas a news report will not go into great depth but describe or report the subject in words only.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Muzammil Chatha and Muska Ijaz

response.answer_text: Mostly? I imagine it's the size and demeanor of your reading audience. News can and should be read by anyone and everyone. Technical reports are written for specific individuals and often use more complicated trade related word language, where as general news articles are intended to use the KISS principal quite frequently so more people can understand it.
